summary:
This is not a god mod, but you will get a boost, and every location on the Map!
Perfect if you have beaten the main game and you want to start over :)
descriptionHtml:
1-2 version: Type into the console ~ (bat helper) with out () and you will get:
Every location on the map!

Conjuration 50
Destruction 50
Enchanting 100
Restoration 50
Marksman 50
HeavyArmor 50
Onehanded 50
Smithing 50
Twohanded 50
Alchemy 50
LightArmor 50

You\'ll still have to level up to get the perks you want. I made some of the skills 0 for this.
Block 0
Lockpicking 0
Pickpocket 0
Sneak 0
Speechcraft 0
Illusion 0
Alteration 0

and as a bonus you will also recive:
100 Lockpicks
$9000000 gold
Every Enchantment perk, a destruction perk, and half the Smithing perks!

No bugs that I know of :)
This is my first mod!

Old version: Type into the console ~ (bat helper) with out () and you will get:
Every location on the map!

Conjuration 50
Destruction 50
Enchanting 100
Restoration 50
Marksman 50
HeavyArmor 50
Onehanded 50
Smithing 50
Twohanded 50
Alchemy 50
LightArmor 50


You\'ll still have to level up to get the perks you want. I made some of the skills 0 for this.
Block 0
Lockpicking 0
Pickpocket 0
Sneak 0
Speechcraft 0
Illusion 0
Alteration 0

and as a bonus you will also recive:
100 Lockpicks
$9000000 gold

No bugs that I know of :)
This is my first mod!
author: AbleOne
